name: Arthas Menethil
description: Arthas Menethil aka. 'The Lich King', became the Lich King after betraying his people and his mentor.

name: Jaina Proudmoore
description: Jaina, Archmage of the Kirin Tor, is a powerful mage and the leader of the Kirin Tor. She was once the lover of Arthas Menethil, but she opposed his descent into darkness.

name: Sylvanas Windrunner
description: Dark Lady of the Forsaken Sylvanas, is a former ranger-general of Silvermoon and the current leader of the Forsaken. She was killed by Arthas Menethil and turned into a banshee, but she later regained her free will.

name: Thrall
description: Thrall is a powerful shaman and the former Warchief of the Horde. He was raised as a slave by humans, but he escaped and founded a new Horde with other races.

name: Tyrande Whisperwind
description: Tyrande High Priestess of Elune, is a powerful priestess and the leader of the night elves. She is the lover of Malfurion Stormrage.

name: Gul'dan
description: Gul'dan, Master of the Shadow Council is a powerful warlock and the founder of the first Horde. He was corrupted by the Burning Legion, a demonic army that seeks to destroy all life.

name: Varian Wrynn
description: Varian is the former king of Stormwind and a legendary warrior. He wields a sword called Shalamayne, which can split into two blades. He is also known as Lo'Gosh, the Ghost Wolf.

name: Sargeras
description: Sargeras The Dark Titan is the leader of the Burning Legion, a vast army of demons that seeks to destroy all life in the cosmos. He wields a massive sword called Gorshalach, which can cleave worlds in half. He is also known as the Destroyer of Worlds, the Great Enemy, and the Fallen One.

name: Vol'jin
description: Vol'jin is the former warchief of the Horde and the leader of the Darkspear trolls. He wields a spear called Zul'jin, which can channel his shadow magic. He is also known as the Shadow Hunter, the Son of Sen'jin, and the Savior of the Horde.

name: Maiev Shadowsong
description: Maiev, Warden of the Barrow Deeps is the former leader of the Watchers, a group of night elf wardens who guarded Illidan Stormrage. She is also known as the Huntress, the Betrayer's Nemesis, and the Warden of the Betrayer.

name: Malfurion Stormrage
description: Marlfurion, Archdruid of the Cenarion Circle is the first and greatest druid, and the twin brother of Illidan Stormrage. He wields a staff called the Staff of the Wild, which can summon nature's fury. He is also known as the Archdruid, the Shando, and the Betrayer's Brother.

name: Illidan Stormrage
description: Illidan is the former leader of the Illidari, a group of demon hunters who sacrificed their eyes and souls to fight the Burning Legion. He wields two warglaives called the Warglaives of Azzinoth, which can slice through any armor. He is also known as the Betrayer, the Lord of Outland, and the Demon Hunter.
